      • searchBook

        @RequestMapping(value="/search",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public java.lang.String searchBook(@RequestParam(required=false,value="title")
                                                                                                                                                java.lang.String title,
                                                                                                                                                @RequestParam(required=false,value="isbn")
                                                                                                                                                java.lang.String isbn,
                                                                                                                                                @RequestParam(required=false,value="startIndex")
                                                                                                                                                java.lang.Integer startIndex,
                                                                                                                                                @RequestParam(required=false,value="maxResults")
                                                                                                                                                java.lang.Integer maxResults,
                                                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="apiKey")
                                                                                                                                                java.lang.String apiKey)
                                                                                                                                         throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        This method searches the books using Google Books API. You can search a book by "title" or "ISBN" and can control the number of results returned
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the book
        isbn - The ISBN Number of the book
        startIndex - The start index for searching books (default is "0")
        maxResults - The number of results to be fetched (default is "10" and max is "40")
        apiKey - The API Key of the logged in User
        Returns:
        String
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - Intermediate base class for all problems encountered when processing (parsing, generating) JSON content that are not pure I/O problems. Regular IOExceptions will be passed through as is. Sub-class of IOException for convenience

      • addToFavouritesAndToRead

        @RequestMapping(value="/fav_read/add",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
public java.lang.String addToFavouritesAndToRead(@RequestParam(value="email")
                                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="bookId")
                                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String bookId,
                                                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="type")
                                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String type)
                                                                                                                                                              throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        This method adds a book to "Favorites" or "To Read" list for the Logged In User. If type = fav then the book is added to "Favorites" and if type = read then the book is added to "To Read" list
        Parameters:
        email - Email ID of the Logged In User
        bookId - ID of the book to be added
        type - Type of the book to be added i.e. "fav" or "read"
        Returns:
        String
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - Intermediate base class for all problems encountered when processing (parsing, generating) JSON content that are not pure I/O problems. Regular IOExceptions will be passed through as is. Sub-class of IOException for convenience

      • getFavouritesAndToRead

        @RequestMapping(value="/fav_read",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public java.lang.String getFavouritesAndToRead(@RequestParam(value="email")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="type")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String type)
                                                                                                                                                       throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        This method fetched all the "Favorites" or "To Read" books for the Logged In User. If type = fav then "Favorites" list is returned and if type = read then "To Read" list is returned
        Parameters:
        email - Email ID of the Logged In User
        type - Type of the book to be fetched i.e. "fav" or "read"
        Returns:
        String
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - Intermediate base class for all problems encountered when processing (parsing, generating) JSON content that are not pure I/O problems. Regular IOExceptions will be passed through as is. Sub-class of IOException for convenience

      • removeFromFavouritesAndToRead

        @RequestMapping(value="/fav_read/remove",
                method=DELETE,
                produces="application/json")
public java.lang.String removeFromFavouritesAndToRead(@RequestParam(value="email")
                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="bookId")
                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String bookId,
                                                                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="type")
                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String type)
                                                                                                                                                                        throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        This method removes a book from "Favorites" or "To Read" list for the Logged In User. If type = fav then book is removed from "Favorites" list and if type = read then book is removed from "To Read" list
        Parameters:
        email - Email ID of the Logged In User
        bookId - ID of the book to be removed
        type - Type of the book to be removed i.e. "fav" or "read"
        Returns:
        String
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - Intermediate base class for all problems encountered when processing (parsing, generating) JSON content that are not pure I/O problems. Regular IOExceptions will be passed through as is. Sub-class of IOException for convenience

      • addReview

        @RequestMapping(value="/reviews/add",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
public java.lang.String addReview(@RequestParam(value="bookId")
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String bookId,
                                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="isbn")
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String isbn,
                                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="email")
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(required=false,value="review")
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String review,
                                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="rating")
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String rating,
                                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="apiKey")
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String apiKey)
                                                                                                                                              throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        This method adds a Review for a book
        Parameters:
        bookId - ID of the book for which the Review is being added
        isbn - ISBN Number of the book for which the Review is being added
        email - Email ID of the User adding the Review
        review - User Review text
        rating - User Rating
        apiKey - API Key of the User adding the Review
        Returns:
        String
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - Intermediate base class for all problems encountered when processing (parsing, generating) JSON content that are not pure I/O problems. Regular IOExceptions will be passed through as is. Sub-class of IOException for convenience

                       java.lang.String bookDetails,

        Parameters:

      • getUserStatus

        public java.lang.String getUserStatus(java.lang.String email,
                                      java.lang.String apiKey)
        This method returns the User Status
        Parameters:
        email - Email ID of the user
        apiKey - API Key of the user
